name: Go Back To Your Roots
description:
____________________________________

Find your true family

____________________________________

Description

A dungeon crawler puzzle where Mushi the mushroom has to navigate a maze filled with roots in order to get back to its family :)

____________________________________

Features
  • An Indie, dungeon crawler, puzzle game!
  • Simple and intuitive mechanics;
  • A unique soundtrack;
Controls
  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact - "E" 
  • Pause Menu - "ESC"

____________________________________
